notes: {{JSpoiler|Someone spawns and despawns this creature during {{Spoiler Section|The Scatterbrained Sorcerer Quest|Mission 3: Love's a Wicked Game}}.}}
sounds: By the great mother of fire! What is this?
Can I at least have a beer??
I'll hail no one, not even Durin, until I am brought back to where I was just moments ago!
If I ever find out who is behind all that... GRR!
What the... where is this place?
name: Grodrik (Creature)
location: In a [[Void]] in the space-time continuum under [[Eclesius]]' house.
